all_the_buzz.utilities.authentication module

all_the_buzz.utilities.authentication.authentication(token) → Credentials

Authenticates users credentials given generated json web token.

Parameters:

token – a dictionary in format {‘token’: <token string>}

Returns:

a Credential object initialized from returned credentials.

Return type:

cred
